intent_atoms.description: Implement the stsd sample description parser to enumerate media sample entries.
The stsd parser must correctly enumerate all media sample entries as defined in the specification.
The implementation is considered complete when the parser produces the expected enumeration of media sample entries and passes all relevant unit tests.
Evaluate additional handler type categorizations if future boxes require specialized roles beyond the current mapping set.
Handler type categorizations must remain consistent with existing mappings unless a new requirement is identified.
A refined categorization scheme is documented and reviewed when new handler types are added.
Schedule macOS CLI/UI large-file benchmark execution using the R4 protocol.
Benchmark results must reflect accurate performance metrics for large files.
Benchmarks run on dedicated macOS hardware and executed with the R4 protocol, resulting in a report.
